name: Square One [Demo]
description:
Caitlin Price has never been able to walk away from someone in trouble, even when her impulsive acts of kindness come at a cost. Perhaps that’s why, when she notices a strange girl about to leap toward the train tracks, she can’t stop herself from intervening. 

Much to her surprise, her damsel in distress is not at all grateful for being saved. Caitlin only catches a glimpse of shockingly violet eyes glaring back at her before the girl runs away in tears. The girl far out of sight, Caitlin bends down to retrieve the only evidence left of the encounter: a silver smartphone, fallen from the pocket of the vanished girl. 

Why did she want to end her life? Maybe the answers lie inside the device… but maybe it’s better not to know.

★ Square One is a visual novel about bonding and growth. It tells the story of the relationship that blooms between an impulsive optimist and the troubled girl she pulls back from the brink of despair. Follow Caitlin and the strange girl on their journey of self-discovery, healing, and love... while uncovering a few mysteries along the way.

Content warning: Mental Health / Suicide / Eating Disorders / Language
